trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class creates a TCP/IP or UDP LDAP connection to Microsoft Active Directory Domain Services or an LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类创建与 Microsoft Active Directory 域服务或 LDAP 服务器的 TCP/IP 或 UDP LDAP 连接。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection>对象和<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A>属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions>对象都设置中, 指定的证书<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建连接块或者无法打开与服务器的连接，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定服务器的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier)" /> 构造函数使用指定的目录标识符创建 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The logon credentials and the Negotiate Authentication are used to connect to the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 登录凭据和协商身份验证用于连接 LDAP 服务器。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建连接块或者无法打开与服务器的连接，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A string specifying the server which can be a domain name, LDAP server name or dotted strings representing the IP address of the LDAP server.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定服务器的字符串，它可以是域名、LDAP 服务器名称或表示 LDAP 服务器的 IP 地址的带点的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, this parameter may also include a port number, separated from the right end of the string by a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 此外，此参数可能还包括一个端口号，用冒号 (:) 与字符串的右端隔开。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.String)" /> 构造函数使用指定服务器创建 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建连接块或者无法打开与服务器的连接，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定服务器的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 对象，指定要使用的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier and network credentials.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> 构造函数使用指定的目录标识符和网络凭据创建 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Negotiate Authentication is used.
trans-unit.target: 将使用协商身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建连接块或者无法打开与服务器的连接，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> object that specifies the server.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定服务器的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 对象，指定要使用的凭据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> values that specifies the type of authentication to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的身份验证类型的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> class using the specified directory identifier, network credentials, and authentication type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapDirectoryIdentifier,System.Net.NetworkCredential,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.AuthType)" /> 构造函数使用指定的目录标识符、网络凭据和身份验证类型创建 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if it fails to create a connection block or fails to open a connection to server.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法创建连接块或者无法打开与服务器的连接，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="authType" /> 超出范围，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is specified as Anonymous but <paramref name="credential" /> specified credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 <paramref name="authType" /> 指定为“匿名”但 <paramref name="credential" /> 指定了凭据，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 要求值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 一个引用该异步请求的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method cancels the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Abort(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法取消异步请求。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if <paramref name="asyncResult" /> was not returned by the corresponding call to <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" />
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> 而没有返回相应的 <paramref name="asyncResult" />，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property contains the supported authentication types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 属性包含支持的身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: A supported authentication type.
trans-unit.target: 支持的身份验证类型。

trans-unit.source: Thrown when <paramref name="authType" /> is out of range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="authType" /> 超出范围，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> property specifies whether an automatic bind is allowed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AutoBind" /> 属性指定是否允许自动绑定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the automatic bind is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许自动绑定，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将数据异步发送到服务器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> 枚举中的一个值，用于指定要返回的部分结果的级别。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 函数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 包含此请求的状态数据的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法通过异步方式向服务器发送数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步发送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 为 <see langword="null" />（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Partial results are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持部分结果。

trans-unit.source: A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="partialMode" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />，则必须指定回调函数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 请求超时之前的时间，以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A value from <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> enumeration that specifies the level of partial result to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing" /> 枚举中的一个值，用于指定要返回的部分结果的级别。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> function.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 函数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 包含此请求的状态数据的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method sends data asynchronously to the server.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan,System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法通过异步方式向服务器发送数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that references the asynchronous send.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步发送的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="request" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="request" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Partial results are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持部分结果。

trans-unit.source: A callback function must be specified if <paramref name="partialMode" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="partialMode" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultProcessing.ReturnPartialResultsAndNotifyCallback" />，则必须指定回调函数。

trans-unit.source: Sends an LDAP bind.
trans-unit.target: 发送 LDAP 绑定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the current credentials.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind" /> 方法使用当前凭据发送 LDAP 绑定。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to one of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error codes.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码未映射到其中一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> 属性指定多个要发送的客户端证书以进行身份验证，或者 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 属性为“匿名”，并提供一个或多个凭据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> object that specifies the credentials to use.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 对象，指定要使用的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> method sends an LDAP bind using the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Bind(System.Net.NetworkCredential)" /> 方法使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.NetworkCredential" /> 发送 LDAP 绑定。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码未映射到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Either the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> property specifies more than one client certificate to send for authentication, or the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> property is Anonymous and one or more credentials are supplied.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates" /> 属性指定多个要发送的客户端证书以进行身份验证，或者 <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.AuthType" /> 属性为“匿名”，并提供一个或多个凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> property contains the network credentials for the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Credential" /> 属性包含该对象的网络凭据。

trans-unit.source: The network credentials for the object.
trans-unit.target: 该对象的网络凭据。

trans-unit.source: Closes and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: 关闭并释放（可选）LDAP 句柄。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose" /> method closes and releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose" /> 方法关闭并释放 LDAP 句柄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle is released when the connection is closed or <see langword="false" /> if the connection is closed without releasing the handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果关闭连接后释放句柄，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果关闭连接后不释放句柄，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method closes the connection and optionally releases the LDAP handle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 方法关闭连接，并可选择释放 LDAP 句柄。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象，它包含该请求的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method completes an asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.EndSendRequest(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法完成异步请求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the results of the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，它包含该请求的结果。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 如果已释放相应对象，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 与 <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> 调用中返回的 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码不映射到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器返回了有错误的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> method allows an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Finalize" /> 方法允许 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 对象在“垃圾回收”功能回收 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 对象之前尝试释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object that contains state data for this request.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 对象，它包含该请求的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> method retrieves partial results of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.GetPartialResults(System.IAsyncResult)" /> 方法检索异步操作的部分结果。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection" /> object that contains the partial results.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含部分结果的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PartialResultsCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放该对象。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> does not match the <paramref name="asyncResult" /> returned in the <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> call.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 与 <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.BeginSendRequest" /> 调用中返回的 <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码不映射到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器返回了有错误的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: Sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个 LDAP v3 操作发送单个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该请求的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest)" /> 方法将单个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 作为 LDAP v3 操作进行发送。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，其中包含来自该服务器的响应。

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放该对象。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
trans-unit.target: 请求的类型是 DsmlAuthRequest。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码未映射到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器返回了有错误的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> object that contains the request.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含该请求的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, until the request times out.
trans-unit.target: 请求超时之前的时间长度（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> method sends a single <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> as an LDAP v3 operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SendRequest(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest,System.TimeSpan)" /> 方法将单个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryRequest" /> 作为 LDAP v3 操作进行发送。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object that contains the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，其中包含来自该服务器的响应。

trans-unit.source: The object is already disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放该对象。

trans-unit.source: The object handle is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该对象句柄无效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />）。

trans-unit.source: Request is of type DsmlAuthRequest.
trans-unit.target: 请求的类型是 DsmlAuthRequest。

trans-unit.source: The error code returned by LDAP does not map to a the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> enumeration error code.
trans-unit.target: LDAP 返回的错误代码未映射到 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ResultCode" /> 枚举错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Thrown if the server returned a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> object with an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器返回了有错误的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryResponse" /> 对象，则引发该异常。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> property contains an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.SessionOptions" /> 属性包含一个指定会话选项的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> object that specifies the session options.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定会话选项的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection> object and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A> property on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions> object are both set, the certificate specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection>对象和<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions.QueryClientCertificate%2A>属性<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapSessionOptions>对象都设置中, 指定的证书<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryConnection.ClientCertificates%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> property contains the length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection.Timeout" /> 属性包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 超时前的时间长度（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The length of time, in seconds, before the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> times out.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection" /> 超时前的时间长度（以秒为单位）。
